T04D3915:41a-39: gyi khams mtha' yas pa rnams su chos kyi char
T04D3915:41a-40: 'bebs pas na chos kyi sprin zhes bya'o //
T04D3915:41a-41: gzhan yang phung po yongs su dag pa la sogs
T04D3915:41a-42: pa'i rnam par gzhag pa rnams kyis sa rnam par
T04D3915:41a-44: yi ge mangs kyis dogs nas ma bris so //
T04D3915:41a-45: des sprul pa la sogs pa'i dbang thob kyang ji
T04D3915:41a-46: srid du shes bya thams cad la rnam pa thams
T04D3915:41a-47: cad du chags pa med pa dang /
T04D3915:41b-0: thogs pa med pa'i ye shes bskyed @41b par mi nus pa de srid du sa bcu pa'o //
T04D3915:41b-1: gang gi tshe nus pa de'i tshe yan lag de
T04D3915:41b-2: yongs su rdzogs pas sangs rgyas kyi sar rnam par
T04D3915:41b-3: gzhag go // sa rnam par gzhag pa 'di ni
T04D3915:41b-4: 'phags pa dgongs pa nges par 'grel pa las bstan
T04D3915:41b-5: gzhag go // to // sangs rgyas kyi sa 'di
T04D3915:41b-6: ni phun sum tshogs pa rnam pa thams cad mtha'
T04D3915:41b-7: dag rab kyi mthar phyin pa'i phyir 'di las gong
T04D3915:41b-8: na rnam pa gzhan med pas de phan chad sa
T04D3915:41b-9: rnam par gzhag pa med do //
T04D3915:41b-10: sangs rgyas kyi sa de'i yon tan gyi phyogs rab
T04D3915:41b-11: tu dbye ba dpag tu med pas rnam pa thams
T04D3915:41b-12: cad brjod pa ni sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang mi
T04D3915:41b-13: spyod na bdag 'dra bas lta smos kyang ci dgos
T04D3915:41b-15: 'phags pa sdong po bkod pa las kyang /
T04D3915:41b-16: shin tu brtags kyang rang byung gi //
T04D3915:41b-17: yon tan rnams kyi phyogs gcig mtha' //
T04D3915:41b-18: mi rtog sangs rgyas rnams dang ni //
T04D3915:41b-19: chos rnams bsam gyis mi khyab bo //
T04D3915:41b-20: zhes bka' stsal pa lta bu'o //
T04D3915:41b-21: mdor 'di tsam zhig brjod par nus te /
T04D3915:41b-22: bdag dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa rab
T04D3915:41b-23: kyi mthar phyin pa nyes pa ma lus pa bsal
T04D3915:41b-24: ba'i mthar thug pa brnyes nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan
T04D3915:41b-25: 'das rnams chos kyi sku la bzhugs te /
T04D3915:41b-26: longs spyod rdzogs pa dang sprul pa'i skus 'gro ba
T04D3915:41b-27: ma lus pa'i don lhun gyis grub pa'i tshul gyis
T04D3915:41b-28: mdzad cing 'khor ba ji srid par bzhugs so //
T04D3915:41b-29: de lta bas na rtog pa dang ldan pa rnams
T04D3915:41b-30: kyis yon tan thams cad kyi 'byung gnas bcom ldan
T04D3915:41b-31: 'das rnams la dad pa bskyed la de dag gi
T04D3915:41b-32: yon tan yongs su bsgrub pa'i phyir rnam pa thams
T04D3915:41b-33: cad kyis rab tu 'bad par bya'o //
T04D3915:41b-34: sku gsum la sogs pa'i rnam par dbye ba ni yi ge mangs kyis dogs te ma bris so //
T04D3915:41b-35: mdo sde dag gi tshul gyis lugs mthun pa //
T04D3915:41b-36: rgyal ba'i sras kyi lam 'di legs bshad pas //
T04D3915:41b-37: bdag gis bsod nams mi chung gang thob des //
T04D3915:41b-38: 'gro ba shes zhan blo mchog myur thob shog /
T04D3915:41b-39: sa'i mnga' bdag dpal lha btsan pos bka' stsal nas
T04D3915:41b-40: ka ma la sh'i las bsgom pa'i rim pa mdor
T04D3915:41b-42: bsgom rim dang po rdzogs so /
T04D3915:41b-44: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradzny'a warma dang /
T04D3915:41b-45: zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba bande ye shes sde
T04D3915:41b-46: la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab
